head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AMERY, DONALD F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AMERY, DONALD F.

block.p: AMERY-Donald F. On August 24, 2000, in Greenwich, CT. Loving father of Douglas T. Amery, Drew P. Amery, and brother to Austin Amery. Also survived by five loving grandchildren. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday, August 29, at 11 AM in the Leo P. Gallagher & Son Funeral Home, 31 Arch St., Greenwich, CT. Friends may call on Monday from 6-9 PM. Memorial contributions to the National Federation of the Blind of Connecticut, East Hartford, CT.
